Name: Vandozer
About the game: 'Vandozer' is a punishing Trials-meets-QWOP vehicle romp, where mastering the unique controls is both the challenge and the reward. Van Gameplay: While piloting Vandozer, use the van's three pistons in order to jump, climb, cling and grind your way through the challenging levels. The controls are completely physics-driven, so get creative with how you use the pistons. Unlock new regions on the world map and see if you can make it to 'The Final Climb'. Walker Gameplay: Tired of living in a van? Step into the giant G.O.A.T. Walker and manipulate each of the four legs independently. Make sure to lean left and right to ensure a balanced ride. Donâ€™t worry if you lose a leg or two, the G.O.A.T. Walker is designed to persevere.
